price: (108) Wherein they abide eternally. They will not desire from it any transfer.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يَبۡغُونَ عَنۡهَا حِوَلٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā lā yabghūna ʿanhā ḥiwalan
